ai.summary: A short, easy urban loop walk starting and ending at Fulwell station in the UK. At about 0.6 km, this quick route is ideal for a casual stroll, a transit-side break, or a gentle warm-up.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily flat urban pavement with well-defined paths. The loop uses sidewalks and paved connectors; surfaces are smooth with occasional curb edges.
ai.safety_notes: Be mindful of crossings and traffic near the station area. Use designated pedestrian areas, watch for cyclists on shared paths, and carry a phone in case of emergencies. Weather can change quickly; wear appropriate clothing and sturdy footwear.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn for the most comfortable conditions; can be done year-round with suitable clothing in winter.
